short_summary: Supply of one boat, 60 HP outboard motor, trailer, and sonar system.
description: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number M5000-23-1538/C dated January 17, 2023 with a closing of January 31, 2023 at 2:00 pm CST
full_summary:
**Supply Boat with Outboard Motor, Trailer, and Sonar System**

**Procurement Contract Reference:** PW-23-01028459

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for the supply of a boat, equipped with a 60 HP outboard motor, trailer, and sonar system.

The solicitation is based on the following request:

* The successful bidder must deliver the goods on or before April 30, 2023.
* The basis of selection is a responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price.

**Delivery Information**

The delivery of the goods will be made to the RCMP on or before the above-mentioned date. Please refer to the attached tender documents for additional information regarding delivery requirements.

**Terms and Conditions**

The solicitation contains the following terms and conditions:

* Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Procuring Officer: Shailesh Rajgor, RCMP Procurement Contracting Services.

**Additional Information**

The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. As a result, the integrity provisions are being applied in RCMP contracting activities.

**Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS)**

Canada will make available notices of proposed procurement, bid solicitations, and related documents for download through GETS at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities . Canada is not responsible and will not assume any liabilities whatsoever for the information found on websites of third parties.

**Indigenous Procurement**

The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for all levels of government and the private sector to identify Indigenous business capacity. Having a business profile in the IBD will increase your company’s visibility and may provide additional business. A profile in the IBD can also allow you to compete for federal government contracts that are set-aside for Indigenous businesses through the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses.

**Contact Information**

For any questions or concerns, please contact Shailesh Rajgor, RCMP Procurement Contracting Services, at shaileshkumar.rajgor@rcmp-grc.gc.ca or Cindy Glover, Team Leader, at cindy.glover@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.

**Tender Documents**

Please refer to the attached tender documents to obtain further information.

**Procurement Status**

This tender is closed. The pertinent procurement information can be found below:

* **Procurement Category:** Goods
